name: Djurskyddet Sverige
goal: “Djurskyddet Sverige/Animal Protection Sweden” is one of the largest animal welfare NGOs in Sweden. We are a non-profit organization that has existed for over 100 years. Our vision is a society where humans show respect and compassion for all animals. We aim for all animals to be treated well, regardless if they live in the wild, are kept as pets or are bred to be food.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Education, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Eurogroup of animals, Stop the trucks, Positive list campaign, Animal welfare platform
